text: Marco Simoncelli (20 January 1987 â€“ 23 October 2011) was an Italian motorcycle racer. He competed in the Road Racing World Championship for 10 years from 2002 to 2011. ==Death== Simoncelli died after an accident during the 2011 Malaysian Grand Prix at Sepang on 23 October 2011. ==References== Category:Italian sportspeople Category:2011 deaths Category:1987 births
title: Marco Simoncelli
